long_description: Using a smartphone for GPS mapping, route directions or music while on your bike? The Topeak SmartPhone DryBag 4 offers highly water-resistant protection and secure mounting for your device. The SmartPhone DryBag 4 is designed to fit most smartphones with screens that measure 3 - 4 in. diagonally across the screen. Thermoplastic urethane dry bag securely holds your smartphone; clear touch window prominently displays phone screen for easy use. Sonically welded seams provide highly water-resistant protection, eliminating stitch breakdown and possible entry points for moisture. Included Topeak QuickClick(TM) mounting system allows you to easily attach the SmartPhone DryBag 4 to the bike stem or handlebar without tools.
short_description: Using a smartphone for GPS mapping, route directions or music while on your bike? The Topeak SmartPhone DryBag 4 offers highly water-resistant protection and secure mounting for your device.
